artist: Artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
description: bridge with umbrellas (blue and purple with white) held by figures on bridge visible over railing; trees on opposite side of bridge; grey sky with rain falling
inscription: left margin: 昭和十一年四月写 {Shōwa jūichinen shigatsu sha} (transcribed in April 1936)

medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From One-hundred Views of New Tokyo (Shin Tōkyō hyakkei 新東京百景)
title: Spring Rain at Benkei Bridge
